LanguageData.VPE_Eltex.label: arcanium
LanguageData.VPE_Eltex.description: An extremely mysterious mineral that is both malleable and serves as a physical conduit for mages. Some speculate that this mineral forms when powerful spells are cast in areas of high background mana, when the ripples in the background mana field from several spells collide and react, forming tiny fragments of arcanium.
